title: Bullseye
description: In this short story from #1 "New York Times" bestselling author David Baldacci, worlds collide when government assassin Will Robie is caught, along with Oliver Stone of the Camel Club in a crossfire.Robie is closing in on his next target when he finds himself in the middle of a bank heist--and is taken hostage. Alongside Oliver Stone of all people! Is this just a simple bank job? Or are the robbers after something even more valuable, and dangerous, than the cash in the vault?Librarian's note #1: the story is only available as an eBook or an audio book.Librarian's note #2: there are five novels and a short story in the author's Camel Club series. They are: #1. The Camel Club (2005), #2. The Collectors (2006), #3. Stone Cold (2007), #4. Divine Justice (2008), and #5. Hell's Corner (2010). The short story is #6. Bullseye (2014) - an Original Will Robie / The Camel Club Short Story.
author: David Baldacci
